layout.name: platformWidth
layout.title: Platform Width
layout.tooltip: The width of the platform (in blocks).

layout.name: radius
layout.title: Radius
layout.tooltip: How far away the platform is from the controller.

layout.name: startingRotation
layout.title: Starting Rotation
layout.tooltip: How many degrees it starts out at.

layout.name: rotationSpeed
layout.title: Rotation Speed
layout.tooltip: How many degrees it rotates per frame. Positive means clockwise, negative means counter-clockwise.

layout.name: displayCentreJoint
layout.title: Display Centre Joint
layout.tooltip: If ticked, a joint will be present where the centre of rotation is. Recommended to be set to false if attached to a block.

layout.name: lineSpeed
layout.title:
Lineguided
Movement Speed
layout.tooltip: How fast it moves, if attached to a lineguide.
